document_data.name: ''Tyr's Justice''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Tyr's Justice''''' was an enchanted [[greatsword]] wielded by [[Nayeli Goldflower]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Nayeli's most prized blade was crafted out of [[devil]]-tainted [[gold]] and encrusted with [[gem]]stones.
document_data.Powers: Apart from being a fierce enchanted blade, ''Tyr's Justice'' allowed the wielder to cast the ''[[searing smite]]'' spell on one enemy at a time.
document_data.History: Following the death of [[Maldwyn Daggerford]] in [[1485 DR]], Nayeli Goldflower, the member of the [[Guardians of Daggerford]], commissioned the creation of ''Tyr's Justice'' out of devil-tainted gold and gems that were on Duke Daggerford body during his assassination. The jewelry was melted and fashioned into the hilt of the blade that was to become Nayeli's instrument of vengeance.
document_data.Notable Owners: *Nayeli Goldflower: a [[paladin]] from the city of [[Daggerford]] and an adventurer who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
